original_text: There is nobody on the earth who is so righteous that they always do what is right. There is nobody who never does a wrong thing. There is nobody on the earth who is so righteous that they always do what is right. There is nobody who never does a wrong thing. There is nobody on the earth who is so righteous
korean_text: 선을 행하고 전혀 죄를 범하지 아니하는 의인은 세상에 없기 때문이로다

sentences.original_text: There is nobody on the earth
that they always do what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 항상 올바른 일을 하는 사람은 없다

sentences.original_text: who never does a wrong thing
sentences.korean_translation: 결코 잘못된 일을 하지 않는 사람은 없다

sentences.original_text: There is nobody on the earth
that they always do what is right

sentences.korean_translation: 결코 잘못된 일을 하지 않는 사람은 없다

sentences.original_text: There is nobody on the earth
